title: Apraava Energy bags transmission project in Rajasthan
description: Apraava Energy has secured a new interstate transmission project in Rajasthan through tariff-based competitive bidding by the central government. The project includes setting up 200 km of high-voltage transmission lines and a pooling station. It is part of the interstate green energy corridor, facilitating the evacuation of 5.5 GW of renewable power from Rajasthan's Renewable Energy Zone Phase IV.
